page.title: 17BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {MRS NEEDHAM-WINSFORD. Mrs Needham is an old age pensioner living on the Grange Council Estate. She moved to Winsford from Liverpool almost twenty years ago. Mr Needham travelled to Liverpool daily from Winsford before he was able to get a job in Winsford.They moved to Winsford from Liverpool because. {(a)}Jobs were easier to get. {(b)}All houses had inside toilets and gardens. {(c)}All new houses were smokeless and had no chimneys. {(d)}The air was cleaner and there was a country atmosphere. Twenty years ago few people owned cars and much of the land was farmland. Now it has been built on and larger shops and supermarkets have taken the place of the small family shops.
